name: Xilonen
desc:
"Ardent Flames Forge the Soul" Xilonen

The peaks resound, their golden veins gleaming.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Sure thing, I was just planning on taking a rest."
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Xilonen's deck is centered on Nightsoul's Blessings, and makes her well-suited to triggering effects by switching characters.</color>

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color>
Deals 2 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> . If <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> is attached to self, then regain 1 Nightsoul point.
<color=#ece5d8>Nightsoul's Blessing</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
The character to which this is attached accumulates <color=#ffffff>"Nightsoul points."</color> (Max 2 points)

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Attach <color=#ffffff>Combat Blading Gear</color> to this character, then enter <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> and gain 1 <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul point.</color> (This skill cannot be used after the character enters <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> )
(Characters with <color=#ffffff>Combat Blading Gear</color> attached can use the Technique: <color=#ffffff>High-Speed Leap</color> )

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 2 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> . Draw 1 card and heal the most damaged character on your side for 1 HP. Draw 1 additional card for each stack of <color=#ffffff>Source Sample: Geo</color> , and heal 1 additional HP for each stack of <color=#ffffff>Source Sample</color> of another Element.
<color=#ece5d8>Source Sample: Geo</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the Round begins:</color> If the character to which this is attached has 2 Nightsoul points, create 1 <color=#ffffff>Take Extra Geo DMG</color> on the opponent's side of the field. After activating all <color=#ffffff>Source Samples</color> , consume 2 Nightsoul points.

<color=#ffd780>Passive Skill</color>
(Passive) When the battle begins, create 3 stacks of <color=#ffffff>Source Sample: Geo</color> . When you have Pyro, Hydro, Cryo, or Electro characters on your side, then convert 1 stack of <color=#ffffff>Source Sample: Geo</color> to a <color=#ffffff>Source Sample</color> of the corresponding Element.
<color=#ece5d8>Source Sample: Geo</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When the Round begins:</color> If the character to which this is attached has 2 Nightsoul points, create 1 <color=#ffffff>Take Extra Geo DMG</color> on the opponent's side of the field. After activating all <color=#ffffff>Source Samples</color> , consume 2 Nightsoul points.

<color=#ffd780>Equipment Card</color>
The character to which this is attached has their <color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> dealt converted to <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>Technique</color> : High-Speed Leap
When the attached character has 0 <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul points</color> , discard this card. When this card is discarded, the attached character's <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> ends.
<color=#ece5d8>Nightsoul's Blessing</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
The character to which this is attached accumulates <color=#ffffff>"Nightsoul points."</color> (Max 2 points)
<color=#ece5d8>High-Speed Leap</color>
<color=#ffd780>Technique</color>
The character to which this is attached consumes 1 <color=#ffffff>Nightsoul point</color> . Draw 3 cards.

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Technique</color>
When the active character is equipped with a Technique card, they can use the corresponding Technique.
Using a Technique counts as a Combat Action. If the character is unable to use Skills due to conditions like Frozen, Petrification, or Stun, they are also unable to use the Technique.
Using a Technique is not considered as using a Skill. Therefore, it cannot trigger effects such as "After using a skill" or "After the character triggers an Elemental Reaction." Damage dealt by using a Technique is not considered Damage dealt by the character.

value.name: Tour of Tepeilhuitl
value.desc:
Xilonen: Tour of Tepeilhuitl

"Let the mountain's veins boil!"

value.text: Reward for inviting Xilonen to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Xilonen
value.desc: A Name Engraver of the Nanatzcayan, she is especially skilled at finding a good balance between the heavy responsibilities of her job and living well.
